title: Rimski's list of many things
description: a compiled list of things for you to look out for.
//use d2 gunsmith to get wishlist items and paste them under your section.
//leave a blank line after your last item that clears stuff.
//if the gun is a craftable then it wont show up at all for some reason.
//also if you specify every single perk on a gun it will not show up unless it’s the exact same
//perfect god rolls
//notes:Dyllan’s PvE rolls
